data.title: Co-Trainer
description: When I was a bachelor's student, I am taking a job as Freelance Trainer for one week. My daily job was train employees to use Warehouse Management System Applications at PT.Pertamina Lubricants based on DSP Batakan - Balikpapan.
Working with their company to handle inbound and outbound
